    • Constructor Detail

      • fireDangerCalculator

        public fireDangerCalculator(double dryTemp,
                    double wetTemp,
                    boolean isSnow,
                    double precip,
                    double windSpeed,
                    double buo,
                    int iHerb)
        Instantiates a new fire danger calculator. The following are input values needed to calculate the National Fire Danger Ratings and Fire Load Index
        Parameters:
        dryTemp - the dry bulb temperature
        wetTemp - the wet bulb temperature
        isSnow - the boolean variable to indicate if there is snow on the ground
        precip - the precipitation
        windSpeed - the current wind speed in miles per hour
        buo - the last value of the build up index
        iHerb - the current herb state 1=cured, 2=transition, 3=green

    • Method Detail

      • adjustBuildUpIndex

        public void adjustBuildUpIndex(double precip)
        The following method calculates the Build Up Index based on yesterday's build up. The Build Up Index is adjusted when precipitation exceeds 0.1 inches. Precipitation is the past 24 hours precipitation in inches and hundredths.
        Parameters:
        precip - the precipitation in the past 24 hours

      • calcFineFuelMoisture

        public void calcFineFuelMoisture(double dryTemp,
                        double wetTemp)
        The following method calculates the Fine Fuel Moisture (ffm). The depression of the wet bulb (dif = dryTemp - wetTemp) is used to decide which set of piecewise regression coefficients (which set of A and B) will be used.
        Parameters:
        dryTemp - the dry bulb temperature
        wetTemp - the wet bulb temperature

      • calcDryingFactor

        public void calcDryingFactor()
        This method calculates the Drying Factor based on values of coeffD[].

      • adjustFfmWithHerb

        public void adjustFfmWithHerb(int iHerb)
        This method adjusts the Fine Fuel Moisture based on the current herb stage. The ffm is added 5% for each herb stage greater than one.
        Parameters:
        iHerb - the current herb state 1=cured, 2=transition, 3=green

      • adjustBuoWithDryingFactor

        public void adjustBuoWithDryingFactor()
        Adding the Drying Factor to today's Build Up after correction for rain is adjusted

      • calcAdfm

        public void calcAdfm()
        This method calculates the Adjusted Fuel Moisture based on the current Fine Fuel Moisture with today's Build Up Index

      • adjustGrassTimberIndex

        public void adjustGrassTimberIndex(double windSpeed)
        The following method adjusts the Grass and Timber Indexes based on wind speed and the Adjusted Fuel Moisture. There are two conditions that are being checked for. The first condition is the adfm. If it is greater than 30%, the Grass and Timber indexes will be set to 1. The second condition is the wind speed. If it is greater than 14 Mph, a different formula will be used to adjust the Grass and Timber indexes.
        Parameters:
        windSpeed - the current wind speed in miles per hour

      • calcFload

        public void calcFload()
        This method calculates the Fire Load Index when both Timber Spread and Build Up Indexes are zero. Ensure that Fload is greater than zero, otherwise set it to zero.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method to test all values in calculating the Fire Danger Ratings
        Parameters:
        args -
